intro: These Terms & Conditions govern your use of the NOBT World website and services. By accessing this website or confirming a booking, you agree to be bound by the terms outlined below.

sections.title: 1. Booking & Usage Terms
items: By accessing and using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation.
Prices mentioned are subject to change without prior notice.
By proceeding with a booking, you accept these terms.

The company is not liable for changes caused by weather conditions, government regulations, or unforeseen circumstances.
The company reserves the right to modify itineraries if required for safety or operational reasons.

sections.title: 3. Traveler Responsibilities
items: Travelers must carry valid identification documents and comply with local laws during the trip.
Any damage to property or misconduct during the trip will be the responsibility of the traveler.
Certain trips may require participants to meet physical, mental, or health requirements. Travelers should consult the company before booking.

sections.title: 4. Cancellation & Refund Policy

Denial of boarding or entry due to visa, documentation, or personal issues

Cancellation due to personal reasons beyond the stated policy timeline

sections.title: 5. Acceptance Clause
sections.content: By accessing this website or confirming any booking, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the Terms & Conditions, Cancellation & Refund Policy, and Disclaimer.
